name: Albus Dumbledore
message: I should have known that you would be here, Professor McGonagall.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: Good evening, Professor Dumbledore. Are the rumours true Albus?

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: I'm afraid so, Professor. The good, and the bad.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: And the boy?

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: Hagrid is bringing him.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: Do you think it wise to trust Hagrid with something as important as this?

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: Ah, Professor, I would trust Hagrid with my life.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Professor Dumbledore, Sir. Professor McGonagall.

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: No problems, I trust, Hagrid?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: No, Sir. Little tyke fell asleep just as we were flying over Bristol. Heh.Try not to wake him. There you go.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: Albus, do you really think it's safe, leaving him with these people? I've watched them all day. They're the worst sort of Muggles imaginable. They really are

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: The only family he has.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: This boy will be famous. There won't be a child in our world who doesn't know his name.

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: Exactly. He's far better off growing up away from all of that. Until he is ready.

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: There there, Hagrid. It's not really goodbye, after all.

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: Good luck, Harry Potter.

name: Petunia Dursley
message: Up. Get up. Now!

name: Dudley Dursley
message: Wake up, cousin! We're going to the zoo!

name: Petunia Dursley
message: Oh, here he comes, the birthday boy!

name: Vernon Dursley
message: Happy birthday, son.

name: Petunia Dursley
message: Why don't you just cook the breakfast, and try not to burn anything.

name: Harry Potter
message: Yes, Aunt Petunia.

name: Petunia Dursley
message: I want everything to be perfect for my Dudley's special day.

name: Vernon Dursley
message: Hurry up! Bring my coffee, boy!

name: Harry Potter
message: Yes, Uncle Vernon.

name: Petunia Dursley
message: Aren't they wonderful, darling?

name: Dudley Dursley
message: How many are there?

name: Vernon Dursley
message: Thirty-six. Counted them myself.

name: Dudley Dursley
message: Thirty-six?! But last year, last year I had thirty-seven!

name: Vernon Dursley
message: Err yes, well, some of them are quite a bit bigger than last year.

name: Dudley Dursley
message: I don't care how big they are!

name: Petunia Dursley
message: Oh, now, now, now. This is what we're going to do, is that when we go out, we're going to buy you two new presents! How's that, pumpkin?

name: Petunia Dursley
message: This will be a lovely day at the zoo. I'm really looking forward to it.

name: Vernon Dursley
message: I'm warning you now, boy. Any funny business, any at all, and you won't have any meals for a week. Get in.

name: Dudley Dursley
message: Make it move.

name: Vernon Dursley
message: Move!

name: Dudley Dursley
message: MOVE!

name: Harry Potter
message: He's asleep!

name: Dudley Dursley
message: He's boring.

name: Harry Potter
message: Sorry about him. He doesn't understand what it's like, lying there day after day, having people press their ugly faces in on you.

name: Harry Potter
message: Can you hear me? It's just I've never talked to a snake before. Do you I mean do you talk to people often?

name: Harry Potter
message: You're from Burma, aren't you? Was it nice there, do you miss your family?

name: Harry Potter
message: I see. That's me as well. I never knew my parents, either.

name: Dudley Dursley
message: Mummy, dad, come here! You won't believe what this snake is doing!

name: Dudley Dursley
message: Whoa! Ahh! Ahh!!

name: Snake
message: Thanks.

name: Harry Potter
message: Any time.

name: Dudley Dursley
message: Mum, mummy!

name: Petunia Dursley
message: AHH!

name: Dudley Dursley
message: Mum, help! Help me!

name: Petunia Dursley
message: My darling boy! How did you get in there?! How did you get in there? Dursley, oh, Dursley!

name: Petunia Dursley
message: It's all right, sweetheart. It's all right.

name: Harry Potter
message: Ow!

name: Vernon Dursley
message: What happened?!

name: Harry Potter
message: I swear I don't know! One minute, the glass was there and then it was gone! It was like magic!

name: Vernon Dursley
message: There's no such thing as magic!

name: Vernon Dursley
message: Oh, Marge is ill! Ate a funny whelk.

name: Dudley Dursley
message: Dad! Look! Harry's got a letter!

name: Harry Potter
message: Hey, give it back! It's mine!

name: Vernon Dursley
message: Yours? Who'd be writing to you?

name: Vernon Dursley
message: No more mail through this letterbox.

name: Petunia Dursley
message: Have a lovely day at the office, dear.

name: Vernon Dursley
message: Shoo! Go on!

name: Vernon Dursley
message: Fine day Sunday. In my opinion, best day of the week. Why is that, Dudley?

name: Harry Potter
message: Because there's no post on Sunday?

name: Vernon Dursley
message: Ah, right you are, Harry. No post on Sunday. Ha! No blasted letters today. No, sir. Not one single letter, not one. No, sir, not one blasted, miserable-

name: Dudley Dursley
message: AHH! Make it stop! Please make it stop!

name: Vernon Dursley
message: Go away, ahh!

name: Dudley Dursley
message: What is it? Please tell me what is happening!

name: Vernon Dursley
message: Give me that! Give me that letter!

name: Harry Potter
message: Get off! Ahh!

name: Vernon Dursley
message: Ahh!

name: Harry Potter
message: They're my letters! Let go of me!

name: Vernon Dursley
message: That's it! We're going away! Far away! Where they can't find us!

name: Dudley Dursley
message: Daddy's gone mad, hasn't he?!

name: Harry Potter
message: Make a wish, Harry.

name: Vernon Dursley
message: Who's there? Ahh!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Sorry 'bout that.

name: Vernon Dursley
message: I demand that you leave at once, sir! You are breaking and entering!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Dry up, Dursley, you great prune.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Boy, I haven't seen you since you was a baby, Harry, but you're a bit more along than I would have expected. Particularly 'round the middle!

name: Dudley Dursley
message: I-I-I'm not Harry.

name: Harry Potter
message: I-I am.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Oh, well, of course you are! Got something for ya. 'Fraid I might have sat on it at some point! I imagine that it'll taste just the same. Ahh. Baked it myself. Words and all. Heh.

name: Harry Potter
message: Thank you!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: It's not every day that your young man turns eleven, now is it?

name: Harry Potter
message: Excuse me, who are you?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Rubeus Hagrid. Keeper of keys and grounds at Hogwarts. Course, you'll know all about Hogwarts.

name: Harry Potter
message: Sorry, no.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: No? Blimey, Harry, didn't you ever wonder where your mum and dad learned it all?

name: Harry Potter
message: Learned what?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: You're a wizard, Harry.

name: Harry Potter
message: I-I'm a what?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: A wizard. And a thumping good one at that, I'd wager. Once you train up a little.

name: Harry Potter
message: No, you've made a mistake. I can't be a-a wizard. I mean, I'm just Harry. Just Harry.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Well, just Harry. Did you ever make anything happen? Anything you couldn't explain when you were angry or scared? Ah.

name: Harry Potter
message: Dear, Mr. Potter. We are pleased to inform you that you have been accepted at Hogwarts' School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

name: Vernon Dursley
message: He'll not be going! We swore when we took him in, we'd put a stop to this rubbish!

name: Harry Potter
message: You knew? You know all along and you never told me?

name: Petunia Dursley
message: Of course we knew. How could you not be? My perfect sister being who she was. Oh, my mother and father were so proud the day she got her letter. We have a witch in the family. Isn't it wonderful? I was the only one to see her for what she was. A freak! And then she met that Potter, and then she had you, and I knew you'd be just the same, just as strange, just as... abnormal. And then, if you please, she went and got herself blown up. And we got landed with you.

name: Harry Potter
message: Blown up? You told me my parents died in a car crash!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: A car crash? A car crash kill Lily and James Potter?

name: Petunia Dursley
message: We had to tell him something.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: It's an outrage! It's a scandal!

name: Vernon Dursley
message: He'll not be going! We swore when we took him in, we'd put a stop to this rubbish!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Oh, and I suppose a great Muggle like yourself's going to stop him, are you?

name: Harry Potter
message: Muggle?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Non magic folk. This boy's had his name down ever since he was born! He's going to the finest school of witchcraft and wizardry in the world, and he'll be under the finest headmaster that Hogwarts has ever seen: Albus Dumbledore.

name: Vernon Dursley
message: I will not pay for some crackpot old fool to teach him magic tricks!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Never, insult Albus Dumbledore, in front of me.

name: Dudley Dursley
message: Ahh!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Oh, um, I'd appreciate if you didnt tell anyone at Hogwarts about that. Strictly speaking, I'm not allowed to do magic.

name: Harry Potter
message: Okay.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Ooh, we're a bit behind schedule. Best be off. Unless you'd rather stay, of course! Hmm?

name: Harry Potter
message: All students must be equipped with one standard size two pewter cauldron, and may bring if they desire, either an owl, a cat or a toad. Could we find all this in London?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: If you know where to go.

name: Tom
message: Ah, Hagrid! The usual, I presume?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: No thanks, Tom. I'm on official Hogwarts business today. Just helping young Harry here buy his school supplies.

name: Tom
message: Bless my soul. It's Harry Potter.

name: Doris Crockford
message: Doris Crockford, Mr. Potter. I can't believe I'm meeting you at least.

name: Quirinus Quirrell
message: Harry P-potter. C-can't tell you how pleased I am to meet you.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Hello, Professor. I didn't see you there. Harry, this is Professor Quirrell. He'll be your Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts.

name: Harry Potter
message: Oh, nice to meet you.

name: Quirinus Quirrell
message: F-fearfully fascinating subject. N-not that you need it, eh, Potter? Heheh.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Yes, well, must be going now. Lots to buy. Heh.

name: Harry Potter
message: Goodbye.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: See, Harry, you're famous!

name: Harry Potter
message: But why am I famous, Hagrid? All those people back there, how is it they know who I am?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: I'm not exactly sure I'm the right person to tell you that, Harry. Welcome, Harry, to Diagon Alley. Here's where you'll get your quills and ink, and over there all your bits and bobs for doing your wizardry.

name: Harry Potter
message: But, Hagrid, how am I to pay for all this? I haven't any money.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Well, there's your money, Harry. Gringotts, the Wizard Bank. Aint no place safer, 'cept perhaps Hogwarts.

name: Harry Potter
message: Uh, Hagrid, what exactly are these things?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: They're goblins, Harry. Clever as they come goblins, but not the most friendly of beasts. Best stick close to me. Mr. Harry Potter wishes to make a withdrawal.

name: Goblin
message: And does Mr. Harry Potter have his key?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Oh. Wait a minute. Got it here somewhere. Hah. There's the little devil. Oh, and there's something else as well. Professor Dumbledore gave me this. It's about you-know-what in vault you-know-which.

name: Goblin
message: Very well.

name: Griphook
message: Vault six-hundred-and-eighty-seven. Lamp, please. Key, please.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Didn't think your mum and dad would leave you with nothing now, did ya?

name: Griphook
message: Vault seven-hundred-and-thirteen.

name: Harry Potter
message: What's in there, Hagrid?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Can't tell you, Harry. It's Hogwarts business. Very secret.

name: Griphook
message: Stand back.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Best not mention this to anyone, Harry.

name: Harry Potter
message: I still need a wand.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: A wand? Well, you'll want Ollivanders. Ain't no place better. Run along there, but wait. I just got one more thing I got to do. Won't be long.

name: Harry Potter
message: Hello? Hello?

name: Garrick Ollivander
message: I wondered when I'd be seeing you, Mr. Potter. It seems only yesterday that your mother and father were in here buying their first wands. Ah. Here we are. Well, give it a wave. Apparently not. Perhaps this. No, no, definitely not! No matter... I wonder. Curious, very curious

name: Harry Potter
message: Sorry, but whats curious?

name: Garrick Ollivander
message: I remember every wand I've ever sold, Mr. Potter. It just so happens that the phoenix, whose tail feather resides in your wand gave another feather, just one. It is curious that you should be destined for this wand when its brother gave you that scar.

name: Harry Potter
message: And who owned that wand?

name: Garrick Ollivander
message: Oh, we do not speak his name. The wand chooses the wizard, Mr. Potter. It's not always clear why, but I think it is clear that we can expect great things from you. After all, He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named did great things terrible, yes, but great.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Harry! Harry! Happy birthday!

name: Harry Potter
message: Wow.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: You all right, Harry? Seem very quiet.

name: Harry Potter
message: He killed my parents, didn't he? The one who gave me this. You know, Hagrid, I know you do.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: First, and understand this, Harry, 'cause it's very important, not all wizards are good. Some of them go bad. A few years ago, there was one wizard who went as bad as you can go. And his name was V-his name was V-...

name: Harry Potter
message: Maybe if you wrote it down?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: No, I can't spell it. All right. Voldemort.

name: Harry Potter
message: Voldemort?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Sshh! It was dark times, Harry, dark times. Voldemort started to gather some followers, brought 'em over to the dark side. Anyone that stood up to him ended up dead. Your parents fought against him, but nobody lived once he decided to kill 'em. Nobodynot one. 'Cept you.

name: Harry Potter
message: Me? Voldemort tried to kill me?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Yes. That ain't no ordinary cut on your forehead, Harry. A mark like that only comes from being touched by a curse and an evil curse at that.

name: Harry Potter
message: What happened toto You-Know-Who?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Well, some say he died. Codswallop in my opinion. Nope, I reckon he's out there, still, too tired to go on. But one thing's absolutely certain. Something about you stumped him that night. That's why you're famous. That's why everybody knows your name. You're the boy who lived.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: What're you looking at? Blimey, is that the time? Sorry, Harry, I'm gonna have to leave you. Dumbledore'll be wanting his- well, he'll be wanting to see me. Now, uh, your train leaves in ten minutes. Here's your ticket. Stick to it, Harry that's very important. Stick to your ticket.

name: Harry Potter
message: Platform nine-and-three-quarters? But, Hagrid, there must be a mistake. This says Platform nine-and-three-quarters. There's no such thing is there?

name: Harry Potter
message: Excuse me, excuse me. Excuse me, sir. Can you tell me where I might find Platform nine-and-three-quarters?

name: Guard
message: Nine-and-three-quarters? Think you're being funny, do ya?

name: Molly Weasley
message: It's the same year after year. Always packed with Muggles, of course.

name: Harry Potter
message: Muggles?

name: Molly Weasley
message: Come on. Platform nine-and-three-quarters this way! All right, Percy, you first.

name: Molly Weasley
message: Fred, you next.

name: George Weasley
message: He's not Fred, I am!

name: Fred Weasley
message: Honestly, woman, you call yourself our mother.

name: Molly Weasley
message: Oh, I'm sorry, George.

name: Fred Weasley
message: I'm only joking. I am Fred.

name: Harry Potter
message: Excuse me! C-could you tell me how to-

name: Molly Weasley
message: How to get onto the platform? Yes, not to worry, dear. It's Ron's first time to Hogwarts as well. Now, all you've got to do is walk straight at the wall between platforms nine and ten. Best do it at a bit of a run if you're nervous.

name: Ginny Weasley
message: Good luck.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Excuse me, do you mind? Everywhere else is full.

name: Harry Potter
message: Not at all.

name: Ron Weasley
message: I'm Ron, by the way. Ron Weasley.

name: Harry Potter
message: I'm Harry. Harry Potter.

name: Ron Weasley
message: So-so it's true? I mean, do you really have the the

name: Harry Potter
message: The what?

name: Ron Weasley
message: Scar?

name: Harry Potter
message: Oh.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Wicked.

name: Trolley lady
message: Anything off the trolley, dears?

name: Ron Weasley
message: No, thanks, I'm all set.

name: Harry Potter
message: We'll take the lot!

name: Ron Weasley
message: Whoa!

name: Harry Potter
message: Bertie Bott's Every Flavour Beans?

name: Ron Weasley
message: They mean every flavour! There's chocolate and peppermint, and there's also spinach, liver and tripe. George sweared he got a bogey-flavoured one once!

name: Harry Potter
message: These aren't real chocolate frogs, are they?

name: Ron Weasley
message: It's just a spell. Besides, it's the cards you want. Each pack's got a famous witch or wizard. I got about five-hundred myself. Watch it! Oh, that's rotten luck. They've only got one good jump in them to begin with.

name: Harry Potter
message: I got Dumbledore!

name: Ron Weasley
message: I got about six of him.

name: Harry Potter
message: Hey, he's gone!

name: Ron Weasley
message: Well, you can't expect him to hang around all day, can you? This is Scabbers by the way, pathetic isn't he?

name: Harry Potter
message: A little.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Fred gave me a spell as to turn him yellow. Want to see?

name: Harry Potter
message: Yeah!

name: Ron Weasley
message: Ahem. Sun

name: Hermione Granger
message: Has anyone seen a toad? A boy named Neville's lost one.

name: Ron Weasley
message: No.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Oh, are you doing magic? Let's see, then.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Sunshine, daisies, butter mellow, turn this stupid fat rat yellow!

name: Hermione Granger
message: Are you sure that's a real spell? Well, it's not very good, is it? Of course I've only tried a few simple spells myself, and they've all worked for me. For example Oculus Reparo. That's better, isn't it? Holy Cricket, you're Harry Potter! I'm Hermione Granger, and you are..?

name: Ron Weasley
message: I'm Ron Weasley.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Pleasure. You two better change into your robes. I expect we'll be arriving soon. You've got dirt, on your nose, by the way, did you know? Just there.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Right, then! First years! This way, please! Come on, now, don't be shy! Come on now, hurry up!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Hello, Harry.

name: Harry Potter
message: Hey, Hagrid.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Whoa!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Right then. This way to the boats! Come on now, follow me!

name: Ron Weasley
message: Wicked.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: Welcome to Hogwarts. Now, in a few moments, you will pass through these doors and join your classmates. But before you can take your seats, you must be sorted into your houses. They are Gryffindor, Hufflepuff, Ravenclaw and Slytherin. Now, while you're here, your house will be like your family. Your triumphs will earn you house points. Any rule breaking, and you will lose points. At the end of the year, the house with the most points is awarded the house cup.

name: Neville Longbottom
message: Trevor! Sorry.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: The sorting ceremony will begin momentarily.

name: Draco Malfoy
message: It's true then, what they're saying on the train. Harry Potter has come to Hogwarts. This is Crabbe and Goyle. And I'm Malfoy Draco Malfoy. Think my name's funny, do you? No need to ask yours. Red hair, and a half-me-down robe? You must be a Weasley. Well, soon find that some wizarding families are better than others, Potter. Don't want to go making friends with the wrong sort. I can help you there.

name: Harry Potter
message: I think I can tell who the wrong sort are for myself, thanks.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: We're ready for you now. Follow me.

name: Hermione Granger
message: It's not real, the ceiling. It's just bewitched to look like the night sky. I read about it in Hogwarts: A History.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: Will you wait along here, please? Now, before we begin, Professor Dumbledore would like to say a few words.

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: I have a few start of term notices I wish to announce. The first years please note that the Dark Forest is strictly forbidden to all students. Also, our caretaker, Mr. Filch has asked me to remind you that the third floor corridor on the right hand side is out of bounds to everyone who does not wish to die a most painful death. Thank you.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: When I call your name, you will come forth. I shall place the sorting hat on your head, and you will be sorted into your houses. Hermione Granger.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Oh no. Okay, relax.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Mental, that one, I'm telling you.

name: Sorting Hat
message: Ah, right thenhmmright. Okay, Gryffindor!

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: Draco Malfoy.

name: Sorting Hat
message: SLYTHERIN!

name: Ron Weasley
message: There isn't a witch or wizard who went bad who wasn't in Slytherin.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: Susan Bones.

name: Harry Potter
message: Ahh!

name: Ron Weasley
message: Harry, what is it?

name: Harry Potter
message: Nothing nothing, I'm fine.

name: Sorting Hat
message: Let's see. I know Hufflepuff!

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: Ronald Weasley.

name: Sorting Hat
message: HA! Another Weasley. I know just what to do with you Gryffindor!

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: Harry Potter.

name: Sorting Hat
message: Hmm difficult. Very difficult. Plenty of courage, I see, not a bad mind either. There's talent, oh yes, and a thirst to prove yourself. But where to put you?

name: Harry Potter
message: Not Slytherin. Not Slytherin.

name: Sorting Hat
message: Not Slytherin, eh? Are you sure? You could be great, you know. It's all here in your head. And Slytherin will help you on the way to greatness! There's no doubt about that. No?

name: Harry Potter
message: Not Slytherin Anything but Slytherin.

name: Sorting Hat
message: Well, if you're sure, better be Gryffindor!

name: Fred Weasley
message: We got Potter! We got Potter!

name: George Weasley
message: We got Potter! We got Potter!

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: Your attention, please.

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: Let the feast begin.

name: Harry Potter
message: Wow.

name: Seamus Finnigan
message: I'm half and half. Me dad's a Muggle. Mam's a witch. Bit of a nasty shock for him when he found out.

name: Harry Potter
message: Say, Percy, who's that teacher talking to Professor Quirrell?

name: Percy Weasley
message: Oh, that's Professor Snape, head of Slytherin house.

name: Harry Potter
message: What's he teach?

name: Percy Weasley
message: Potions. But everyone knows it's the Dark Arts he fancies. He's been after Quirrell's job for years.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Ahhh!

name: Nearly Headless Nick
message: Hello! How are you? Welcome to Gryffindor.

name: Bloody Baron
message: Whoo-hoo-hoo!

name: Percy Weasley
message: Hello, Sir Nicholas. Have a nice summer?

name: Nearly Headless Nick
message: Dismal. Once again, my request to join the headless hunt has been denied.

name: Ron Weasley
message: I know you! You're Nearly Headless Nick!

name: Nearly Headless Nick
message: I prefer Sir Nicholas if you don't mind.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Nearly headless? How can you be nearly headless?

name: Nearly Headless Nick
message: Like this.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Ahhh!

name: Percy Weasley
message: Gryffindors, follow me, please. Keep up. Thank you. This is the most direct path to the dormitories. Oh, and keep an eye on the staircases they like to change. Keep up, please, and follow me. Quickly now, come on. Come on.

name: Neville Longbottom
message: Seamus, that picture's moving!

name: Ron Weasley
message: Look at that one, Harry!

name: Harry Potter
message: I think she fancies you.

name: The Fat Lady
message: Password?

name: Percy Weasley
message: Caput Draconis. Follow me, everyone. Keep up, quickly, come on. Gather 'round here. Welcome to the Gryffindor Common Room. Boys' dormitories, upstairs and down to your left. Girls, the same on your right. You'll find that your belongings have already been brought up.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Whew, made it. Can you imagine the look on old McGonagall's face if we were late?

name: Ron Weasley
message: That was bloody brilliant.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: Thank you for that assessment, Mr. Weasley. Perhaps if I were to transfigure Mr. Potter and yourself into a pocketwatch, that way one of you might be on time.

name: Harry Potter

message: Yeah, well, he's got to have a name, doesn't he? Don't you, Norbert?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Ohh! Ohh, ohh, oh, well he'll have to be trained up a bit, of course. Who's that?

name: Harry Potter
message: Malfoy.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Oh dear.

name: Harry Potter
message: Hagrid always wanted a dragon. He told me so the first time I met him.

name: Ron Weasley
message: It's crazy. And worse, Malfoy knows.

name: Harry Potter
message: I don't understand. Is that bad?

name: Ron Weasley
message: It's bad.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: Good evening.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: Nothing, I repeat, nothing gives a student the right to walk about the school at night. Therefore, as punishment for your actions, fifty points will be taken.

name: Harry Potter
message: Fifty?!

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: Each. And to ensure it doesn't happen again, all four of you will receive detention.

name: Draco Malfoy
message: Excuse me, Professor. Perhaps I heard you wrong. I thought you said the four of us.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: No, you heard me correctly, Mr. Malfoy. You see as honorable as your intentions were, you too were out of bed after hours. You will serve detention with your classmates.

name: Argus Filch
message: A pity they let the old punishments die. There was a time detention would find you hanging by your thumbs in the dungeons. God I miss the screaming. You'll be serving detention with Hagrid tonight. He's got a little job to do inside the dark forest. A sorry lot this, Hagrid. Oh, good God, man, you're not still on about that bloody dragon.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Norbert's gone. Dumbledore sent him off to Romania to live in a colony.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Well, that's good, isn't it? He'll be with his own kind.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Yeah, but what if he don't like Romania? What if the other dragons are mean to him? He's only a baby after all.

name: Argus Filch
message: Oh, for God's sake, pull yourself together, man. You're going into the forest after all. Got to have your wits about you.

name: Draco Malfoy
message: The forest? I thought that was a joke! We can't go in there! Students aren't allowed. And there are werewolves!

name: Argus Filch
message: There's more than werewolves in those trees, lad. You can be sure of that. Nighty-night.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Right. Let's go.

name: Harry Potter
message: Hagrid, what's that?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: What we're here for. See that? That's unicorn's blood, that is. I found one dead a few weeks ago. Now, this one's been injured bad by something. So, it's our job to find the poor beast. Ron, Hermione, you'll come with me.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Okay.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: And Harry, you'll go with Malfoy.

name: Draco Malfoy
message: Okay. Then I get Fang!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Fine. Just so you know, he's a bloody coward.

name: Draco Malfoy
message: You wait 'til my father hears about this. This is servant's stuff.

name: Harry Potter
message: If I didn't know better, Draco, I'd say you were scared.

name: Draco Malfoy
message: Scared, Potter? Did you hear that? Come on, Fang. Scared.

name: Harry Potter
message: What is it, Fang?

name: Draco Malfoy
message: HELP!!!!!

name: Firenze
message: Harry Potter, you must leave. You are known to many creatures here. The forest is not safe at this time. Especially for you.

name: Harry Potter
message: But what was that thing you saved me from?

name: Firenze
message: A monstrous creature. It is a terrible crime to slay a unicorn. Drinking the blood of a unicorn will keep you alive even if you are an inch from death. But at a terrible price. You have slain something so pure that the moment the blood touches your lips, you will have a half-life. A cursed life.

name: Harry Potter
message: But who would choose such a life?

name: Firenze
message: Can you think of no one?

name: Harry Potter
message: Do you mean to say that thing that killed the unicorn that was drinking its bloodthat was Voldemort?

name: Firenze
message: Do you know what is hidden in the school at this very moment?

name: Harry Potter
message: The Philosopher's Stone.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Harry!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Hello there, Firenze. I see you've met our young Mr. Potter. You all right there, Harry?

name: Firenze
message: Harry Potter, this is where I leave you. You're safe now. Good luck.

name: Hermione Granger
message: You mean You-Know-Who's out there right now, in the forest?

name: Harry Potter
message: But he's weak. He's living off the unicorns. Don't you see? We had it wrong! Snape doesn't want the Stone for himself. He wants the Stone for Voldemort. With the Elixir of Life, Voldemort will be strong again. He'll he'll come back.

name: Ron Weasley
message: But, if he comes back, you don't think he'll try to kill you, do you?

name: Harry Potter
message: I think if he'd had the chance, he might've tried to kill me tonight.

name: Ron Weasley
message: And to think, I've been worrying about my Potions final.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Hang on a minute. We're forgetting one thing. Who's the one wizard Voldemort always feared? Dumbledore. As long as Dumbledore's around, Harry, you're safe. As long as Dumbledore's around, you can't be touched.

name: Hermione Granger
message: I'd always heard Hogwarts end of year exams were frightful, but I found they're rather enjoyable.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Speak for yourself. All right there Harry?

name: Harry Potter
message: My scar. It keeps burning.

name: Hermione Granger
message: It's happened before.

name: Harry Potter
message: Not like this.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Perhaps you should see the nurse.

name: Harry Potter
message: I think it's a warning. It means danger's coming.

name: Harry Potter
message: Oh. Of course.

name: Hermione Granger
message: What is it?

name: Harry Potter
message: Don't you think it's a bit odd that what Hagrid wants more than anything is a dragon and a stranger turns up who just happens to have one? I mean, how many people wander around with dragon eggs in their pocket? Why didn't I see it before?

name: Harry Potter
message: Hagrid, who gave you the dragon egg? What did he look like?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: I dunno. I never saw his face. He kept his hood up.

name: Harry Potter
message: This stranger though, you and he must have talked?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Well, he- he wanted to know what sort of creatures I looked after. I told him, I said after Fluffy, a dragon's gonna be no problem.

name: Harry Potter
message: Did he seem interested in Fluffy?

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Well, of course he was interested in Fluffy. How often do you come across a three-headed dog, even if you're in the trade? But I told him, I said, I said, the trick with any beast is to know how to calm him. Take Fluffy for example, just play him a bit of music and he'll fall straight to sleep. I shouldn't have told you that. Where you going? Wait! Wait!

name: Harry Potter
message: We have to see Professor Dumbledore, immediately!

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: I'm afraid Professor Dumbledore is not here. He received an urgent owl from the Ministry of Magic and left immediately for London.

name: Harry Potter
message: He's gone? But this is important! This is about the Philosopher's Stone.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: How do you know-?

name: Harry Potter
message: Someone's going to try and steal it.

name: Minerva McGonagall
message: I don't know how you three found out about the Stone, but I assure you it is perfectly well protected. Now, would you go back to your dormitories? Quietly.

name: Harry Potter
message: That was no stranger Hagrid met in the village. It was Snape, which means he knows how to get past Fluffy.

name: Hermione Granger
message: And with Dumbledore gone-

name: Severus Snape
message: Good afternoon. Now what would three young Gryffindors such as yourselves be doing inside on a day like this?

name: Hermione Granger
message: Uh, uh, w-w-we were just-

name: Severus Snape
message: You ought to be careful. People will think you'reup to something.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Now what do we do?

name: Harry Potter
message: We go down the trapdoor, tonight.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Trevor. Trevor, sshh, go! You shouldn't be here!

name: Neville Longbottom
message: Neither should you. You're sneaking out again, aren't you?

name: Harry Potter
message: No Neville, listen. We were-

name: Neville Longbottom
message: No, I won't let you! You'll get Gryffindor into trouble again! I-I-I'll fight you.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Neville, I'm really really sorry about this. Petrificus Totalus.

name: Ron Weasley
message: You're a little scary sometimes, you know that? Brilliant, but scary.

name: Harry Potter
message: Let's go. Sorry.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Sorry.

name: Ron Weasley
message: It's for your own good, you know.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Ow, you stood on my foot!

name: Ron Weasley
message: Sorry.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Alohomora.

name: Harry Potter
message: Wait a minute. He's snoring. Snape's already been here. He's put a spell on the harp.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Eugh. It's got horrible breath.

name: Harry Potter
message: We have to move its paw.

name: Ron Weasley
message: What?

name: Harry Potter
message: Come on! Okay. Push.

name: Harry Potter
message: I'll go first. Don't follow until I give you a sign. If something bad happens, get yourselves out. Does it seem a bit quiet to you?

name: Hermione Granger
message: The harp. It's stopped playing.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Euuugh! Yuck! Eugh.

name: Harry Potter
message: Jump!!

name: Ron Weasley
message: Ahhhhhhh!! Wow. Lucky this plant thing's here, really.

name: Harry Potter
message: Wow! Oh, ah!

name: Hermione Granger
message: Stop moving, both of you. This is Devil's Snare. You have to relax. If you don't, it will only kill you faster.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Kill us faster? Oh, now I can relax! Hermione!

name: Harry Potter
message: Hermione!

name: Ron Weasley
message: Now what are we gonna do?

name: Hermione Granger
message: Just relax!

name: Harry Potter
message: Hermione, where are you?

name: Hermione Granger
message: Do what I say! Trust me!

name: Ron Weasley
message: Ahhhhh!! Harry! Harry!

name: Hermione Granger
message: Are you okay?

name: Harry Potter
message: Yeah, yeah, I'm fine.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Ahhhh! Help!

name: Hermione Granger
message: He's not relaxing, is he?

name: Harry Potter
message: Apparently not.

name: Hermione Granger
message: We've gotta do something!

name: Harry Potter
message: What?

name: Hermione Granger
message: Eugh, I remember reading something in Herbology. Um, Devil's Snare, Devil's Snare. It's deadly fun, but will sulk in the Sun. That's IT! Devil's Snare hates sunlight! Lumus Solem.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Ahhhhhhhhh!

name: Harry Potter
message: Ron, you okay?

name: Ron Weasley
message: Yeah.

name: Harry Potter
message: Okay.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Phew! Lucky we didn't panic.

name: Harry Potter
message: Lucky Hermione pays attention in Herbology.

name: Hermione Granger
message: What is that?

name: Harry Potter
message: I don't know. Sounds like wings.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Curious. I've never seen birds like these.

name: Harry Potter
message: They're not birds. They're keys. And I bet one of them fits that door.

name: Hermione Granger
message: What's this all about?

name: Harry Potter
message: I don't know. Strange.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Alohomora! Well, it was worth a try.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Eugh! What are we going to do? There must be a thousand keys up there.

name: Ron Weasley
message: We want a big, old-fashioned one. Probably rusty, like the handle.

name: Harry Potter
message: There! I see it! The one with the broken wing!

name: Hermione Granger
message: What's wrong, Harry?

name: Harry Potter
message: It's too simple.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Oh go on Harry! If Snape can catch it on that old broomstick, you can. You're the youngest Seeker in a century!

name: Ron Weasley
message: This complicates things a bit.

name: Harry Potter
message: Catch the key!

name: Ron Weasley
message: Hurry up!

name: Hermione Granger
message: I don't like this. I don't like this at all.

name: Harry Potter
message: Where are we? A graveyard?

name: Ron Weasley
message: This is no graveyard. It's a chessboard.

name: Harry Potter
message: There's the door.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Now what do we do?

name: Ron Weasley
message: It's obvious, isn't it? We've got to play our way across the room. All right, Harry, you take the empty bishop's square. Hermione, you'll be the queen-side castle. And as for me, I'll be a knight.

name: Hermione Granger
message: What happens now?

name: Ron Weasley
message: Well, white moves first. And thenwe play.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Ron, you don't suppose this is going to be like real wizard's chess, do you?

name: Ron Weasley
message: You there, D-5! Yes Hermione, I think this is going to be exactly like wizard chess.

name: Ron Weasley
message: Castle to E-4! Pawn to C-3!

name: Harry Potter
message: Wait a minute.

name: Ron Weasley
message: You understand right, Harry. Once I make my move, the queen will take me. Then you're free to check the king.

name: Harry Potter
message: No, Ron, no!

name: Hermione Granger
message: What is it?

name: Harry Potter
message: He's going to sacrifice himself.

name: Hermione Granger
message: No you can't! There must be another way!

name: Ron Weasley
message: Do you wanna stop Snape from getting that stone or not? Harry, it's you that has to go on. I know it. Not me. Not Hermione. You. Knight to H-3. Check

name: Harry Potter
message: Ron! No! Don't move! Don't forget, we're still playing. Checkmate

name: Harry Potter
message: Take care of Ron. Then go to the owlery, send a message to Dumbledore. Ron's right. I have to go on.

name: Hermione Granger
message: You'll be okay, Harry. You're a great wizard. You really are.

name: Harry Potter
message: Not as good as you.

name: Hermione Granger
message: Heh, me? Books and cleverness. There are more important things. Friendship and bravery. And Harry, just be careful.

name: Harry Potter
message: Ow! You? N-no, it can't be! Snape, h-he w-was the-

name: Quirinus Quirrell
message: Yes, he does seem the type, doesn't he? Next to him, who would suspect, p-p-poor s-s-s-stuttering Professor Quirrell?

name: Harry Potter
message: But that day, during the Quidditch match, Snape tried to kill me.

name: Quirinus Quirrell
message: No dear boy, I tried to kill you! And trust me, if Snape's cloak hadn't caught fire and broken my eye contact, I would have succeeded, even with Snape muttering his little countercurse.

name: Harry Potter
message: Snape was trying to save me?

name: Quirinus Quirrell
message: I knew you were a danger to me right from the off, especially after Halloween.

name: Harry Potter
message: Th-then you let the troll in!

name: Quirinus Quirrell
message: Very good, Potter, yes. Snape, unfortunately, wasn't fooled. While everyone else was running about the dungeon, he went to the third floor to head me off. He, of course, never trusted me again. He rarely left me alone. But he doesn't understand. I'm never alone. Never. Now, what does this mirror do? I see what I desire. I see myself holding the Stone. But how do I get it?

name: Voldemort
message: Use the boy.

name: Quirinus Quirrell
message: Come here, Potter! Now! Tell me, what do you see? What is it? What do you see?!

name: Harry Potter
message: I'm shaking hands with Dumbledore. I've won the house cup.

name: Voldemort
message: He lies.

name: Quirinus Quirrell
message: Tell the truth!! What do you see?!

name: Voldemort
message: Let me speak to him.

name: Quirinus Quirrell
message: Master, you are not strong enough.

name: Voldemort
message: I have strength enough for this. Harry Potter, we meet again.

name: Harry Potter
message: Voldemort.

name: Voldemort
message: Yes, you see what I've become? See what I must do to survive? Live off another, a mere parasite. Unicorn blood can sustain me, but it cannot give me a body of my own. But there is something that can. Something that, conveniently enough, lies in your pocket. Stop him! Don't be a fool. Why suffer an horrific death, when you can join me, and live.

name: Harry Potter
message: Never!

name: Voldemort
message: Haha. Bravery. Your parents had it too. Tell me, Harry, would you like to see your mother and father again, together? We can bring them back. All I ask is for something in return. That's it, Harry. There is no good and evil, there is only power, and those too weak to see it. Together, we'll do extraordinary things. Just give me the stone.

name: Harry Potter
message: You liar!

name: Voldemort
message: Kill him!

name: Quirinus Quirrell
message: Ahhh, ah ah, ahhhhhhh! What is this magic?

name: Voldemort
message: Fool! Get the stone!

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: Good afternoon, Harry. Tokens from your admirers?

name: Harry Potter
message: Admirers?

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: What happened down in the dungeons beterrn you and Professor Quirrell is a complete secret. So naturally the whole school knows. I see that your friend Ronald has saved you the trouble of opening your chocolate frogs.

name: Harry Potter
message: Ron was here? Is he all right? What about Hermione?

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: Fine. They're both just fine.

name: Harry Potter
message: But what happened to the Stone?

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: Relax, dear boy. The Stone has been destroyed. My friend Nicholas and I have had a little chat, and agreed it was best all around.

name: Harry Potter
message: But then Flamel, he'll die, won't he?

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: He has enough Elixir to set his affairs in order. But yes, he will die.

name: Harry Potter
message: How is it I got the stone, sir? One minute I was staring in the mirror and-

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: Ah. You see, only a person who wanted to find the Stone, but not use it, would be able to get it. That is one of my more brilliant ideas. And between you and me that is saying something.

name: Harry Potter
message: Does that mean, with the Stone gone, that is, that Voldemort can never come back?

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: Ah, I'm afraid there are ways in which he can return. Harry, do you know why Professor Quirrell couldn't bear to have you touch him? It was because of your mother. She sacrificed herself for you, and that kind of act leaves a mark. No, no, this kind of mark cannot be seen. It lives in your very skin.

name: Harry Potter
message: What is it?

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: Love, Harry, love. Ah. Bertie Bott's Every Flavour Beans. I was most unfortunate in my youth to come across a vomit flavoured one, and since then I'm afraid I have lost my liking for them. But I think I could be safe with a nice toffee Mm Alas. Earwax.

name: Harry Potter
message: All right there, Ron?

name: Ron Weasley
message: All right. You?

name: Harry Potter
message: All right. Hermione?

name: Hermione Granger
message: Never better.

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: Another year, gone! And now, as I understand it, the house cup needs awarded and the points stand thus. In fourth place, Gryffindor, with 312 points! In third place, Hufflepuff, with 352 points! Second, Ravenclaw, with 426 points! And in first place, with 472 points, Slytherin house! Yes, well done Slytherin, well done Slytherin. However, recent events must be taken into account and I have a few last minute points to award. To Miss Hermione Granger, for the cool use of intellect while others were in grave peril, fifty points! Second, to Mr. Ronald Weasley, for the best played game of chess that Hogwarts has seen these many years, fifty points! And third, to Mr. Harry Potter, for pure love and outstanding courage, I award Gryffindor house, sixty points!

name: Hermione Granger
message: We're tied with Slytherin!

name: Albus Dumbledore
message: And finally, it takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to your enemies, but a great deal more to stand up to your friends. I award ten points to Neville Longbottom! Assuming my calculations are correct, I believe that a change of decoration is in order! Gryffindor wins the House Cup!

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Come on now, hurry up, you'll be late! Train's leaving. Go on. Come on, hurry up!

name: Hermione Granger
message: Come on, Harry.

name: Harry Potter
message: One minute.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Thought you were leaving without sayin' goodbye, did ya? This is for you.

name: Harry Potter
message: Thanks, Hagrid.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: Go on. On with you, on with you now. Oh, now listen Harry, if that dope of a cousin of yours, Dudley, gives you any grief, you could always threaten him with a nice pair of ears to go with that tail of his.

name: Harry Potter
message: But Hagrid, we're not allowed to do magic away from Hogwarts. You know that.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
message: I do, but your cousin don't, do he? Eh? Hmmhmm

name: Hermione Granger
message: Feels strange to be going home, doesn't it?

name: Harry Potter
message: I'm not going home, not really.
